name: BEST WESTERN Inn & Suites of Merrillville

reviews.text: I usually use TripAdvisor before I book a hotel, but did not this time. And I have to say, I think I'm glad that I didn't. I booked this hotel through AAA, and had no problem w/my reservation. The room was very clean. My only complaint w/the room is that the sleep timer on the tv did not work. The internet connection was excellent. I did not check out the free breakfast. The night staff who checked me in was not overly friendly, but by no means was he rude. The staff in the morning when I checked out was nice. I would stay here again if I end up back in Merrillville for business.
reviews.title: different experience

reviews.text: First of all, BEWARE of Travelocity! They screwed us. Secondly, desk staff not very friendly; housekeeping atrocious. Not willing to work with us due to Travelocity's wrong booking. Ended up having to pay alot more for the room. Not happy!
reviews.title: Below expectations

reviews.text: We had a huge king suite with sofa bed, microwave and refrigerator for a very reasonable price. The room was nice but nothing special. The bathroom was small and cramped but usable.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good location

reviews.text: The housekeeping staff was excellent and friendly.
reviews.title: Rude and Dishonest

likes.disliked: — The rude, dishonest clerk and the fact that Best Western (the company) was unwilling to help us at all.

description: Situated near the Indiana/Illinois border, the Best Western Inn & Suites of Merrillville offers the best in customer service, amenities and accommodations for an unbeatable value. This Merrillville area hotel boasts 52 well-appointed guest rooms and suites, each featuring cable satellite television with HBO and high-speed Internet access. Enjoy an array of amenities such as a complimentary continental breakfast, an indoor heated swimming pool, hot tub, exercise facility and limited business services.
